targets.expr:
sort_desc(topk(5,sum(irate(pg_stat_statements_time_milliseconds{service_name="$service_name"}[10m])) by (queryid, datname, user)) unless 
topk(20,sum(irate(pg_stat_statements_time_milliseconds{service_name="$service_name"}[10m] offset 7d)) by (queryid, datname, user)))
